# openGLContext

**Instance Property**

The layer’s OpenGL context.

## Declaration

```swift
var openGLContext: NSOpenGLContext? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provides access to the layer’s associated [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLContext].  Subclasses shouldn’t invoke `setOpenGLContext:`, but can override it if desired to intercept assignment of the layer’s context.

## Managing the Rendering Context

- **openGLContext(for:)**: Returns the OpenGL context to use for the requested pixel format.
